alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Randolph; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 4:10AM CST until February 05 at 11:01AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Tallapoosa River At Wadley affecting Chambers, Randolph and Tallapoosa Counties. .Heavy rainfall over the Tallapoosa River Basin has led to rises on the Tallapoosa River at Wadley. A flood warning is now in effect. Another statement will be issued by this afternoon, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallapoosa River At Wadley. * WHEN...From early this morning to late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding of pasture lands in the area occurs and cattle and farm equipment should be moved to higher ground if higher stages are forecast. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 13.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:00 AM CST Friday was 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
